brief.title: Brief
brief.description: Applications for work should be productive because of their repetitive usage. Compared to the product in use, the major flows of the clock-in app: Pie are going to be simpler.

why.title: The Problem
why.problem: The company I worked for was using an app with clock-in, leave statistics, and salary information features. One had to go back to the dashboard as he/she switched between features in that clock-in app.
why.opinion: In my opinion, a fluent UI flow is like climbing up or walking down the stairs to reach goals. The flow of the product in use could be simplified.

question.title: Question
question.content: How might we simplify the flows of the routine taks?

flows.title: Flows
flows.description: ”Main Menu“ is not required for completing routine tasks. This can be done with the Tab Bar at the bottom.
flows.another: There will be another ”Going Back and Forth“ if a user has something else to do in the product in use.

items.name: Onboarding
items.description: We work as a remote team. The members get started with Onboarding.

items.name: Why & How
items.description: Product specification is subject to change. We write down WHY the roles we defined are using a clock-in app and HOW they are going to fulfill their goals.

items.name: Limited Resources for a Side Project
items.description: There are many tasks to  accomplish accoring to Roles & Goals. We are moving towards a complete UI flow at the moment due to the scarce time & resources of a side project.
